title: Riot plz check your server
body:
that is a high lag these days, i use the TPG NBN, my internet have no problem to play other games, only play LOL, that what i check. plz fix them, that is a terrible for a player under the lag.

C:\Users\ADMIN>ping 103.224.182.250

正在 Ping 103.224.182.250 具有 32 字节的数据:
来自 103.224.182.250 的回复: 字节=32 时间=153ms TTL=53
来自 103.224.182.250 的回复: 字节=32 时间=154ms TTL=53

    数据包: 已发送 = 4，已接收 = 4，丢失 = 0 (0% 丢失)，

C:\Users\ADMIN>ping google.com

正在 Ping google.com [216.58.199.46] 具有 32 字节的数据:

replies.body:
Hi

Not sure where you got it from, but 103.224.182.250 is not a Riot IP.  Try a tracert to 103.240.227.5, which is in the range for OCE game servers.

Bear in mind the server itself won't respond to pings, but you will be able to tell from the final hop which should be one of our peers...

Cheers!
Mindstar
but i only have 9ms, i use the tpg internet, how can i fix that,feel that very lag in team fight, or on lane, like that miss the data from the server
